message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that I'm sure will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.

Alice, your offer is a bit high for me at this time. I'm very interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $700000 at this stage.  I'm confident this product is a valuable asset and I'm willing to negotiate further.

I understand that $700000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit, so I'm thinking of $950000. This is my best and final offer for now.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $950000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $850000.  This is a serious offer, and I'm ready to finalize the deal if it works for you.

I can see you're serious about acquiring this product, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $850000. However, I still need to make a profit, and I'm willing to compromise further. I can offer you a deal for $920000. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product and the negotiations we've had so far.

Alice, I understand your need to make a profit, but $920000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to offer $875000. This is a significant step closer to your last offer, and I'm hopeful we can finalize the deal at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $900000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for both of us.
